alert.note: Alert for Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 18 at 3:01PM EST until December 19 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Storm total snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Higher Elevations of Indiana County. In West Virginia, Preston and Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening and Tuesday morning commutes.

area.areaDesc: Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston
